lkb41_SpotifyKnockoff

Class Artist

  • java.lang.Object
    • lkb41_SpotifyKnockoff.Artist

  • public class Artist
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Artist Allows you to create instances of the Artist class (as well as an instance in the artist table of database) using a variety of parameters as well as delete artists from the database.
    Author:
    lbley Created: 01/23/18

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      This constructor creates an instance of class Artist using the parameters passed through.
      Artist(java.lang.String artistID, java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String bandName)
      This constructor creates an Artist object if you already know all the property values.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Artist

        public Artist(java.lang.String firstName,
              java.lang.String lastName,
              java.lang.String bandName)
        This constructor creates an instance of class Artist using the parameters passed through. The constructor also assigns a random UUID to the Artist object which will be its artistID. It then creates an SQL INSERT statement using these parameters and attempts to insert the record into the artist table of the database
        Parameters:
        firstName - first name of the artist (if needed)
        lastName - last name of the artist (if needed)
        bandName - name of the the band (if needed)

      • Artist

        public Artist(java.lang.String artistID,
              java.lang.String firstName,
              java.lang.String lastName,
              java.lang.String bandName)
        This constructor creates an Artist object if you already know all the property values. Because all the values are known and passed as parameters, a connection to the database does not need to be created.
        Parameters:
        artistID - the known UUID of the artist
        firstName - the artist's first name (if needed)
        lastName - the artist's last name (if needed)
        bandName - the name of the band (if needed)

      • Artist

        public Artist(java.lang.String artistID)
        This constructor creates an instance of class Artist by taking a known artistID as a parameter. The program searches for this artistID within the artist table of the database and attempts to return properties associated with that ID. These returned values are then used to populate the Artist object being created.
        Parameters:
        artistID - the UUID that was generated for a specific Artist

    • Method Detail

      • deleteArtist

        public void deleteArtist(java.lang.String artistID)
        deleteArtist method deletes an artist from the database using the artist_id as input. It then empties the properties of the Artist object for that specific artist
        Parameters:
        artistID - id of the artist you want to delete
